OK.translation[0].definitions[0].definit: used to show that you agree with something or give permission for someone to do something
OK.translation[0].definitions[0].example: OK, if that’s what you prefer.
OK.translation[0].definitions[1].definit: used to ask someone if they agree with you or will give permission for you to do something
OK.translation[0].definitions[1].example: I’ll see you at seven, OK?
OK.translation[0].definitions[2].definit: used when you start talking about something new, or when you pause before continuing
OK.translation[0].definitions[2].example: OK, let’s move on to the next point.
OK.translation[0].definitions[3].definit: used to tell someone to stop arguing with you or criticizing you
OK.translation[0].definitions[3].example: OK, OK, so I made a mistake.
Look, I’m doing my best, okay?
OK.translation[1].definitions[0].definit: if you are OK, you are not ill, injured, or unhappy
OK.translation[1].definitions[1].definit: something that is OK is acceptable and will not cause any problems
OK.translation[1].definitions[1].example: Will half past eight be OK?
Is it OK if I leave my bags here?
It’s okay for you to go home now.
it is okay (for somebody) to do something
I’ll pay you the rest tomorrow, if that’s OK with you.
OK.translation[1].definitions[1].note_bo: People usually avoid OK or okay in writing, and use more formal words such as acceptable or satisfactory:
We have to make sure that the quality is acceptable.
OK.translation[1].definitions[2].example: ‘How was the film?’ ‘It was okay, but not brilliant.’
I think I did okay in the exam.
OK.translation[1].definitions[3].definit: someone who is OK is nice, pleasant etc
OK.translation[1].definitions[3].example: I’ve met Jim once, and he seems OK.
OK.translation[2].definitions[0].definit: to say officially that you will agree to something or allow it to happen
OK.translation[2].definitions[0].example: The plans have been okayed, so let’s get started as soon as possible.
OK.translation[4].definitions[0].definit: a British magazine which publishes pictures and articles about famous people
